meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Grant Hutchinson Keith Williams Josh Perkins Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4420.

div.div:
2003 College Championship final game 2.
From Yale University.
Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Grant Hutchinson, a freshman at the University of West Florida from Pensacola, Florida (subtotal of $5,000)
Keith Williams, a freshman at Middlebury College from Manchester, Vermont (subtotal of $10,400)
Josh Perkins, a sophomore at Rice University from Houston, Texas (subtotal of $11,111)

tr.td: RELIGION
GRAPHIC NOVELS
MIXED DOUBLES
THE INTERNET
CAPITAL CITY MAYORS
